segment.source: For IT administrators get Minecraft Education Edition
segment.target: For IT administrators get Minecraft Education Edition

segment.source: Learn how IT admins can get and distribute Minecraft in their schools.
segment.target: Learn how IT admins can get and distribute Minecraft in their schools.

segment.source: For IT administrators: get Minecraft Education Edition
segment.target: For IT administrators: get Minecraft Education Edition

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: When you sign up for early access to Minecraft Education Edition, Minecraft will be added to the inventory in your Windows Store for Business, a private version of Windows Store associated with your Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant.
segment.target: When you sign up for early access to Minecraft Education Edition, Minecraft will be added to the inventory in your Windows Store for Business, a private version of Windows Store associated with your Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant.

segment.source: Your Store for Business is only displayed to members of your organization.
segment.target: Your Store for Business is only displayed to members of your organization.

segment.source: Note: If you don't have an Azure AD or Office 365 tenant, you can set up a free Office 365 subscription when you request Minecraft Education Edition.
segment.target: Note: If you don't have an Azure AD or Office 365 tenant, you can set up a free Office 365 subscription when you request Minecraft Education Edition.

segment.source: Add Minecraft to your Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Add Minecraft to your Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Go to http://education.minecraft.net/ and select Get the app.
segment.target: Go to http://education.minecraft.net/ and select Get the app.

segment.source: Click Get the app
segment.target: Click Get the app

segment.source: Enter your email address.
segment.target: Enter your email address.

segment.source: Enter school email address
segment.target: Enter school email address

segment.source: If your email address isn't associated to an Azure AD or Office 365 tenant, you'll be asked to fill in a form.
segment.target: If your email address isn't associated to an Azure AD or Office 365 tenant, you'll be asked to fill in a form.

segment.source: The information will be used to create an Office 365 subscription for your school.
segment.target: The information will be used to create an Office 365 subscription for your school.

segment.source: Select Get the app.
segment.target: Select Get the app.

segment.source: This will take you to the Windows Store for Business to download the app.
segment.target: This will take you to the Windows Store for Business to download the app.

segment.source: You will also receive an email with instructions and a link to the Store.
segment.target: You will also receive an email with instructions and a link to the Store.

segment.source: You can get the app now
segment.target: You can get the app now

segment.source: Sign in to Windows Store for Business with your email address.
segment.target: Sign in to Windows Store for Business with your email address.

segment.source: Read and accept the Windows Store for Business Service Agreement, and then select Next.
segment.target: Read and accept the Windows Store for Business Service Agreement, and then select Next.

segment.source: Minecraft Education Edition opens in the Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Minecraft Education Edition opens in the Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Select Get the app.
segment.target: Select Get the app.

segment.source: This places Minecraft: Education Edition in your Store inventory.
segment.target: This places Minecraft: Education Edition in your Store inventory.

segment.source: Get Minecraft app in Store
segment.target: Get Minecraft app in Store

segment.source: Distribute Minecraft
segment.target: Distribute Minecraft

segment.source: After Minecraft Education Edition is added to your Windows Store for Business, you have three options:
segment.target: After Minecraft Education Edition is added to your Windows Store for Business, you have three options:

segment.source: You can install the app on your PC.
segment.target: You can install the app on your PC.

segment.source: You can assign the app to others.
segment.target: You can assign the app to others.

segment.source: You can download the app to distribute.
segment.target: You can download the app to distribute.

segment.source: App distribution options
segment.target: App distribution options

segment.source: Install for me
segment.target: Install for me

segment.source: You can install the app on your PC.
segment.target: You can install the app on your PC.

segment.source: This gives you a chance to test the app and know how you might help others in your organization use the app.
segment.target: This gives you a chance to test the app and know how you might help others in your organization use the app.

segment.source: Sign in to Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Sign in to Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Click Manage, and then click Install for me.
segment.target: Click Manage, and then click Install for me.

segment.source: Minecraft Education Edition product page
segment.target: Minecraft Education Edition product page

segment.source: Click Install.
segment.target: Click Install.

segment.source: Assign to others
segment.target: Assign to others

segment.source: Enter email addresses for your students, and each student will get an email with a link to install the app.
segment.target: Enter email addresses for your students, and each student will get an email with a link to install the app.

segment.source: This option is best for older, more tech-savvy students who will always use the same PC at school.
segment.target: This option is best for older, more tech-savvy students who will always use the same PC at school.

segment.source: You can assign the app to individuals, groups, or add it to your private store, where students and teachers in your organization can
segment.target: You can assign the app to individuals, groups, or add it to your private store, where students and teachers in your organization can

segment.source: To assign to others
segment.target: To assign to others

segment.source: Sign in to Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Sign in to Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Click Manage.
segment.target: Click Manage.

segment.source: Minecraft Education Edition product page
segment.target: Minecraft Education Edition product page

segment.source: Click Assign to people.
segment.target: Click Assign to people.

segment.source: Assign to people
segment.target: Assign to people

segment.source: Type the name, or email address of the student you want to assign the app to, and then click Assign.
segment.target: Type the name, or email address of the student you want to assign the app to, and then click Assign.

segment.source: You can only assign the app to students with work or school accounts.
segment.target: You can only assign the app to students with work or school accounts.

segment.source: If you don't find the student, you might need to add a work or school account for the student.
segment.target: If you don't find the student, you might need to add a work or school account for the student.

segment.source: Assign to people showing student name
segment.target: Assign to people showing student name

segment.source: To finish Minecraft install (for students)
segment.target: To finish Minecraft install (for students)

segment.source: Students will receive an email with a link that will install the app on their PC.
segment.target: Students will receive an email with a link that will install the app on their PC.

segment.source: Email with Get the app link
segment.target: Email with Get the app link

segment.source: Click Get the app to start the app install in Windows Store app.
segment.target: Click Get the app to start the app install in Windows Store app.

segment.source: In Windows Store app, click Install.
segment.target: In Windows Store app, click Install.

segment.source: Windows Store app with Minecraft page
segment.target: Windows Store app with Minecraft page

segment.source: After installing the app, students can find Minecraft: Education Edition in Windows Store app under My Library.
segment.target: After installing the app, students can find Minecraft: Education Edition in Windows Store app under My Library.

segment.source: Windows Store app showing access to My Library
segment.target: Windows Store app showing access to My Library

segment.source: When students click My Libarary they'll find apps assigned to them.
segment.target: When students click My Libarary they'll find apps assigned to them.

segment.source: My Library for example student
segment.target: My Library for example student

segment.source: Download for others
segment.target: Download for others

segment.source: Download for others allows teachers or IT admins to download a packages that they can install on student PCs.
segment.target: Download for others allows teachers or IT admins to download a packages that they can install on student PCs.

segment.source: This will install Minecraft: Education Edition on the PC, and allows anyone with a Windows account to use the app on that PC.
segment.target: This will install Minecraft: Education Edition on the PC, and allows anyone with a Windows account to use the app on that PC.

segment.source: This option is best for younger students, and for shared computers.
segment.target: This option is best for younger students, and for shared computers.

segment.source: Choose this option when:
segment.target: Choose this option when:

segment.source: You have administrative permissions to install apps on the PC.
segment.target: You have administrative permissions to install apps on the PC.

segment.source: You want to install this app on each of your student's Windows 10 (at least version 1511) PCs.
segment.target: You want to install this app on each of your student's Windows 10 (at least version 1511) PCs.

segment.source: Your students share Windows 10 computers, but sign in with their own Windows account.
segment.target: Your students share Windows 10 computers, but sign in with their own Windows account.

segment.source: Requirements
segment.target: Requirements

segment.source: Administrative permissions are required on the PC.
segment.target: Administrative permissions are required on the PC.

segment.source: If you don't have the correct permissions, you won't be able to install the app.
segment.target: If you don't have the correct permissions, you won't be able to install the app.

segment.source: Windows 10 (at least version 1511) is required for PCs running Minecraft: Education Edition.
segment.target: Windows 10 (at least version 1511) is required for PCs running Minecraft: Education Edition.

segment.source: Check for updates
segment.target: Check for updates

segment.source: Minecraft: Education Edition will not install if there are updates pending for other apps on the PC.
segment.target: Minecraft: Education Edition will not install if there are updates pending for other apps on the PC.

segment.source: Before installing Minecraft, check to see if there are pending updates for Windows Store apps.
segment.target: Before installing Minecraft, check to see if there are pending updates for Windows Store apps.

segment.source: To check for app updates
segment.target: To check for app updates

segment.source: Start Windows Store app on the PC (click Start, and type Store).
segment.target: Start Windows Store app on the PC (click Start, and type Store).

segment.source: Click the account button, and then click Downloads and updates.
segment.target: Click the account button, and then click Downloads and updates.

segment.source: Windows Store app showing access to My Library
segment.target: Windows Store app showing access to My Library

segment.source: Click Check for updates, and install all available updates.
segment.target: Click Check for updates, and install all available updates.

segment.source: Windows Store app showing access to My Library
segment.target: Windows Store app showing access to My Library

segment.source: Restart the computer before installing Minecraft: Education Edition.
segment.target: Restart the computer before installing Minecraft: Education Edition.

segment.source: To download for others
segment.target: To download for others

segment.source: You'll download a .zip file, extract the files, and then use one of the files to install Minecraft: Education Edition on each PC.
segment.target: You'll download a .zip file, extract the files, and then use one of the files to install Minecraft: Education Edition on each PC.

segment.source: Download Minecraft Education Edition.zip.
segment.target: Download Minecraft Education Edition.zip.

segment.source: From the Minecraft: Education Edition page, click Download for others tab, and then click Download.
segment.target: From the Minecraft: Education Edition page, click Download for others tab, and then click Download.

segment.source: Windows Store app showing access to My Library
segment.target: Windows Store app showing access to My Library

segment.source: Extract files.
segment.target: Extract files.

segment.source: Find the .zip file that you downloaded and extract the files.
segment.target: Find the .zip file that you downloaded and extract the files.

segment.source: This is usually your Downloads folder, unless you chose to save the .zip file to a different location.
segment.target: This is usually your Downloads folder, unless you chose to save the .zip file to a different location.

segment.source: Right-click the file and choose Extract all.
segment.target: Right-click the file and choose Extract all.

segment.source: Save to USB drive.
segment.target: Save to USB drive.

segment.source: After you've extracted the files, save the Minecraft: Education Edition folder to a USB drive, or to a network location that you can access from each PC.
segment.target: After you've extracted the files, save the Minecraft: Education Edition folder to a USB drive, or to a network location that you can access from each PC.

segment.source: Install app.
segment.target: Install app.

segment.source: Use the USB drive to copy the Minecraft folder to each Windows 10 PC where you want to install Minecraft: Education Edition.
segment.target: Use the USB drive to copy the Minecraft folder to each Windows 10 PC where you want to install Minecraft: Education Edition.

segment.source: Open Minecraft: Education Edition folder, right-click InstallMinecraftEducationEdition.bat and click Run as administrator.
segment.target: Open Minecraft: Education Edition folder, right-click InstallMinecraftEducationEdition.bat and click Run as administrator.

segment.source: Quick check.
segment.target: Quick check.

segment.source: The install program checks the PC to make sure it can run Minecraft: Education Edition.
segment.target: The install program checks the PC to make sure it can run Minecraft: Education Edition.

segment.source: If your PC passes this test, the app will automatically install.
segment.target: If your PC passes this test, the app will automatically install.

segment.source: Restart.
segment.target: Restart.

segment.source: Once installation is complete, restart each PC.
segment.target: Once installation is complete, restart each PC.

segment.source: Minecraft: Education Edition app is now ready for any student to use.
segment.target: Minecraft: Education Edition app is now ready for any student to use.

segment.source: Manage Minecraft Education Edition
segment.target: Manage Minecraft Education Edition

segment.source: Access to Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Access to Windows Store for Business

segment.source: By default, when a teacher with a work or school account in your edu tenant acquires Minecraft: Education Edition, they are automatically signed up for Window Store for Business, and the Basic Purchaser role is assigned to them.
segment.target: By default, when a teacher with a work or school account in your edu tenant acquires Minecraft: Education Edition, they are automatically signed up for Window Store for Business, and the Basic Purchaser role is assigned to them.

segment.source: Basic Purchaser role allows teachers to acquire Minecraft: Education Edition and to distribute it to students.
segment.target: Basic Purchaser role allows teachers to acquire Minecraft: Education Edition and to distribute it to students.

segment.source: However, tenant admins can control whether or not teachers automatically sign up for Windows Store for Business, and get the Basic Purachaser role.
segment.target: However, tenant admins can control whether or not teachers automatically sign up for Windows Store for Business, and get the Basic Purachaser role.

segment.source: You can configure this with the Allow educators in my organization to sign up for the Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: You can configure this with the Allow educators in my organization to sign up for the Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: You'll find this on the Permissions page.
segment.target: You'll find this on the Permissions page.

segment.source: To prevent educators from automatically signing up for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: To prevent educators from automatically signing up for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: In Windows Store for Business, click Settings, and then click Permissions.
segment.target: In Windows Store for Business, click Settings, and then click Permissions.

segment.source: Permission page for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Permission page for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Click Allow educators in my organization to sign up for the Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: Click Allow educators in my organization to sign up for the Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Roles and permissions
segment.target: Roles and permissions

segment.source: Minecraft: Education Edition adds a new role for teachers: Basic Purchaser.
segment.target: Minecraft: Education Edition adds a new role for teachers: Basic Purchaser.

segment.source: When a teacher has been granted this role, they can:
segment.target: When a teacher has been granted this role, they can:

segment.source: View the Minecraft product description page
segment.target: View the Minecraft product description page

segment.source: Acquire and manage the app
segment.target: Acquire and manage the app

segment.source: Info on Support page (including links to documentation and access to support through customer service)
segment.target: Info on Support page (including links to documentation and access to support through customer service)

segment.source: assign roles to manage Minecraft permissions
segment.target: assign roles to manage Minecraft permissions

segment.source: To assign Basic Purchaser role
segment.target: To assign Basic Purchaser role

segment.source: Sign in to Store for Business
segment.target: Sign in to Store for Business

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You need to be a Global Administrator, or have the Store for Business Admin role to access the Permissions page.
segment.target: You need to be a Global Administrator, or have the Store for Business Admin role to access the Permissions page.

segment.source: Click Settings, and then choose Permissions.
segment.target: Click Settings, and then choose Permissions.

segment.source: Permission page for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Permission page for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Click Add people, type a name, select the correct person, choose the role you want to assign, and click Save.
segment.target: Click Add people, type a name, select the correct person, choose the role you want to assign, and click Save.

segment.source: Permission page for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Permission page for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Windows Store for Business updates the list of people and permissions.
segment.target: Windows Store for Business updates the list of people and permissions.

segment.source: Permission page for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Permission page for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Private store
segment.target: Private store

segment.source: When you create you Windows Store for Business account, you'll have a set of apps included for free in your private store.
segment.target: When you create you Windows Store for Business account, you'll have a set of apps included for free in your private store.

segment.source: Apps in your private store are available for all people in your organization to install and use.
segment.target: Apps in your private store are available for all people in your organization to install and use.

segment.source: These apps will automatically be in your private store:
segment.target: These apps will automatically be in your private store:

segment.source: Word mobile
segment.target: Word mobile

segment.source: Excel mobile
segment.target: Excel mobile

segment.source: PowerPoint mobile
segment.target: PowerPoint mobile

segment.source: OneNote
segment.target: OneNote

segment.source: Sway
segment.target: Sway

segment.source: Fresh Paint
segment.target: Fresh Paint

segment.source: Minecraft: Education Edition
segment.target: Minecraft: Education Edition

segment.source: As an admin, you can remove any of these apps from the private store if you'd prefer to control how apps are distributed.
segment.target: As an admin, you can remove any of these apps from the private store if you'd prefer to control how apps are distributed.

segment.target: Learn more
